meta.title: Organization Invitation
meta.description: On this page you can see the details of an invitation and accept the invitation.
meta.keywords: invitation, organization, accept invitation, decline invitation, invitation details

title: Organization Invitation
description: You have been invited by <0>{{creator}}</0> to join the <1>{{owner}}</1> organization. Please click the button below to accept the invitation. If you do not want to accept the invitation, please Ignore this invitation.

notfound.title: Invitation Not Found
notfound.description: This invitation was not found. Please make sure the invitation is correct.

used.title: Invitation Used
used.description: This invitation has been used before. Please get a new invitation.

deleted.title: Invitation Deleted
deleted.description: This invitation has been deleted by the organization administrators. Please request a new invitation.

timeout.title: Invitation Expired
timeout.description: This invitation has expired. Please request a new invitation.
